q1.question: Where does this data come from?
q1.answer: Data comes from the National Socio-Economic Survey (SUSENAS) BPS 2024 and official minimum wage data from the Ministry of Manpower.

q2.question: Is my salary data stored?
q2.answer: No. All calculations are done directly in your browser. Data is never sent to any server.

q3.question: How accurate is this calculation?
q3.answer: Calculations are based on average per capita expenditure. Individual lifestyle will affect actual results.
